price: They will say, “We stayed for a day or part of a day; ask those who keep count.”[49]
arabic: قَالُواْ لَبِثۡنَا يَوۡمًا أَوۡ بَعۡضَ يَوۡمٖ فَسۡـَٔلِ ٱلۡعَآدِّينَ
footnotes: [49] Compared to the duration and misery of their stay in Hell, their life in this world will seem extremely short to them.
